summary:
• The retired Australian striker made an Olympic comeback due to his exceptional skills.
• His decision was influenced by personal factors that motivated him to return to competition.
• He is now competing in the Olympics, where he aims to make a significant impact on the team's performance.

• Deadly clashes between protesters and police resulted in over 100 fatalities.
• The violence forced authorities to impose a curfew on Dhaka.
• Despite the curfew, the death toll continues to rise due to ongoing unrest.

• Jasper National Park in Canada has been ordered to evacuate due to a nearby wildfire.
• The park is one of Canada's most popular tourist destinations.
• Visitors have been asked to leave immediately to ensure their safety during the evacuation process.

• China aims to unify Palestinian factions through a reconciliation agreement.
• China seeks to establish itself as a global mediator by brokering a Palestinian unity declaration.
• China is interested in a disputed island due to its strategic location.

• A Russian national has been detained due to allegations that they were plotting to destabilize the Paris Olympics.
• French President Emmanuel Macron believes it would be an excellent idea if singer Celine Dion performed during the event.
• In preparation for the upcoming Olympics, the city of Paris will have approximately 75,000 police officers stationed throughout the area.

• Berliners experience thrill of soaring high above the city
• Europe's highest swing takes tourists to new heights
• Adrenaline-pumping fun for visitors to the capital

• Surge in attacks brings fear to calmer parts of Kashmir
• India’s indie films win awards abroad but find no space in theaters at home

- Netanyahu has clashed with US Presidents over decades.
- Israel has ordered the evacuation of its former Gaza safe area.
- Israel has intercepted a missile from Yemen amid airstrikes on a Houthi port.

• Two people died after a walkway collapsed at an infamous Naples estate.
• The incident occurred in the notorious Camorra crime family's territory.
• This is the latest in a series of tragedies plaguing the area.

• One person dies in a shipwreck off the coast of the Falkland Islands.
• The incident occurs during a voyage by Spanish fishing boats.
• A rescue operation is underway to locate survivors.

• Ukraine is experiencing a labor shortage due to the need for soldiers.
• The country's workforce has been drained by the demand for military personnel.
• As a result, Ukraine faces significant challenges in finding enough workers to fill critical roles.

• Kamala Harris criticizes Trump at her first rally, with him responding.
• The head of the US Secret Service resigned due to Trump shooting incidents.
• Senator Bob Menendez is retiring after being convicted of bribery.

• Nicolás Maduro has vowed to maintain power in Venezuela through any means necessary.
• Running against an authoritarian leader requires strategic planning and tactics.
• Despite these challenges, Venezuela's citizens continue to seek democratic alternatives.

• A 'magical' self-portrait was discovered when the canvas was flipped.
• Israel has attacked a Yemeni port after claiming that Houthi rebels had launched a drone strike on Tel Aviv.
• The Houthi rebels have claimed responsibility for launching an unmanned aerial vehicle at the Israeli capital.
